request.Name: Universal
request.Comments: I like city walk. It is a great place to go and just enjoy

request.Name: Outback
request.Comments: Outback steakhouse has great prices. For $10, you can get a huge meanl.

request.Name: Filling Station
request.Comments: The Filling Station has great burgers, but the bar is even better.

request.Name: Brazilina Grocery Store
request.Comments: The Brazilian grocery store is great. It has a lot of things you won't find at any other store and relatively good prices.

request.Name: Camillas
request.Comments: Camillas is an all you can eat Brazilian buffet. The food is great and if you are say you are a resident of FL, you get a small discount in price.

request.Name: Redlight Redlight
request.Comments: Best place in town to taste a new and interesting beer.

request.Name: Farmers Market
request.Comments: Every Sunday there is a Farmers Market at downtown lake eola. Its always fun to walk through if you have time to waste or just want to relax on a Sunday morning.
request.Location: In downtown Orlando near lake Eiola

request.Name: Lowes
request.Location: Off Semoran Blvd south of the 408.
